attributes.review: This app took so long to download and I wasn’t even able to do much with it being installed in my phone, I wanted to learn about my president but it kept on closing me out of my app. It’s disappointing to see that the president can’t even make a decent app for himself. I hope he makes a better one soon, this current one is terrible. I’m dissatisfied.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: After downloading this app I tried to register and it wouldn’t allow me to. I downloaded this app yesterday and 3 hours after downloading it my cell phone company called and told me I had three viruses and all of my contacts have been deleted. I downloaded this app to simply support who I want to continue being president but it has damaged my phone.
attributes.title: 👎🏻 DON’T GET THIS APP!!!!!

attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to support our Lord Orange🍊 but this app took hours to download and once it did an army of his oompa loompa came and attacked me😣 I fought them off but then an army of minions came and invaded my house and said that I had support our Lord Orange🍊 to say the least I can’t believe I made it out alive. This app has destroyed my house and my left tittie. Would 100 not recommend and it gets 1 star.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: I hateeee this app I downloaded to see what was happing and then my phone started glitching and my phone broke down and also we literally have a child predator as our president like the hell anyway I have to get a new phone cuz of the orange presidents app never download this app i will tell u I will save ur phone😡🤬 and also it made roaches come in my house and eat my turtles😤😤🙄🙄🙄
attributes.title: Never downloaded

attributes.review: I can’t believe bad how bad this app is, the second I downloaded it I immediately started to notice the trump ninjas jumping into my house ready to attack, they were all 🍊 and kept on screaming trump 2020🤢, thankfully I fought them back and scared them out of my house 😌 to this day the trump ninjas haven’t returned and without them, America is FINALLY great again 😃. I wouldn’t recommend this app to my worst enemy
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: I am of age to vote so i gave this app a chance. Im here to say it’s the absolutely worse execution decision I could’ve possible made. This app is the entire vain of my existence and my life has only exponentially gotten worse the longer it’s stayed on my phone. Trump app has made me gain weight at an alarming rate and lose my job. It also managed to kill my bird. Do not download this treacherous app. Its social suicide.
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG

attributes.review: this is fake news I followed the instructions to set up the app but I couldn’t do that to my cat why would they ask me to bury her alive this is animal cruelty after that instruction they told me to make toast what does that have to do with the app so after I was done mopping my lawn I came back and the app started playing a game it doesn’t work this app should be deleted✨
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: last night I saw this app in my App Store, and I ADORE bunker bo- I mean Trump. So I downloaded it, and spent hours on it. Then I drifted off to bed and had a HORRIBLE NIGHT TERRORS OF THE APP. In my terrors the app was drop kicking me, and punching me!! It was so frightening, and triggering I had to call my therapist again (Mind you I haven’t seen her in years!!) so I don’t recommend getting this app. I still support orange dud- I mean trump all the way!!  TRUMP 2020 :))
attributes.title: GIVES NIGHT TERRORS!

attributes.review: This app is wack... unfortunately it was talking to me when it was downloading and then started to chant weird rituals in Latin. Ever since I’ve been experiencing demons at night trying to make me “vote for trump” or else they won’t leave. WORST APP EVER and now every time I open it, it makes this noise that makes it rain baby’s outside.....BABYS... they are all getting hurt bc of this WACK app. Sorry trump but -10/10 on this one bud
attributes.title: WACK

attributes.review: Whenever I opened the app, a whole bunch of inappropriate ads flooded my screen. My phone began to glitch and that wasn’t even the worst part. An ear piercing sound came screeching from my phone while having the app open. My poor dog got scared and ran right out the doggy door☹️ he hasn’t came back yet🤕. Man, I sure hope my baby Winslow is okay!! ❤️🐶 Anyways, TO HELL WITH THIS APP🗡😙
attributes.title: This app is complete trash🗑🤮
